summary: This document is a notification about a Second Circuit Court of Appeals decision regarding the unsealing of Epstein-related files. It appears to be an email from the Public Affairs Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, providing a link to the court decision and contact information.

events.title: Second Circuit Decision on Unsealing Epstein Files
events.description: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals issued a decision regarding the unsealing of files related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.

keyFacts: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals made a decision on July 3, 2019, regarding the unsealing of Epstein-related files.
The document provides a link to the court decision: https://assets.documentcloud.org/documents/6181300/Epstein-ca2-20190703.pdf.
The notification comes from the Public Affairs Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document includes contact information for the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
